Event.Name: CustomUnboundColumnData event handler creation.

Languages.EventItem: 'If e.IsGetData Then ' e.Value = "My Value" 'EndIf 'If e.IsSetData ' myValueStore = e.Value 'EndIf If e.IsGetData Then e.Value = "My value" EndIf

Event.Description: You have to write the code to get and set value from/to unbound column.
